title: Soap spoilers: Coronation Street and EastEnders deaths, Emmerdale explosion and Hollyoaks arrival
text:
Lives are hanging in the balance in a tragic week of soap drama – but who will live and who will die? As Coronation Street’s local prison is rocked by a stabbing, the final hours of Sinead Tinker (Katie McGlynn) dawn back on the Street and life will never be the same again. Elsewhere, a sudden death in EastEnders brings back horrific memories for Jay Mitchell (Jamie Borthwick) – and leads him on a path to revenge.

Over in Emmerdale, there is a major fight for life as Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) takes on Nate Robinson (Jurell Carter) over his affair with Moira (Natalie J Robb) and when an explosion rips through the boat, not everyone may surface. Over in Hollyoaks, the death of Harry Thompson, brings Tony Hutchinson’s (Nick Pickard) father Edward (Joe McGann) to the village – but not all is as it seems.

EastEnders

1. As Ben tightens his control over Martin, he confides in Kush and the friends hatch a plan to bring Ben down. But as Ben sets out to prove that he is not one to be messed with, things between him and Martin reach breaking point and Martin is in serious danger.

2. Jay is given a new funeral to arrange and he and Callum are taken aback by the demands from the family. Jay is taken aback when he finds out that the deceased is Terry Bates, the man who killed his dad Jase. Vowing to expose him for what he was, what is Jay planning?

2. Chantelle returns to work at the salon and is overjoyed to be a part of the team again. But as she gets comfortable, Gray is less than impressed. Later, Chantelle is surprised when he makes a sudden and public announcement about her pregnancy.

4. Jean is delivered a parcel containing a message from Daniel, who insists that she lives her life to the full and takes risks. But as she takes his message on board, she goes a little bit too far and gets herself into trouble.

5. Keanu and Louise are shocked by Lisa’s plan to take them to Portugal but Louise starts to come round to the idea. However, when Lisa overhears Louise’s gratitude towards her ‘second mum’ Mel, she can’t help but feel upset.

6. Whitney is gutted when her stall is vandalised but Leo steps in to help her. However, Callum is soon left suspecting that Leo is not all that he seems and Leo fears that he could get in the way of his plan. Later, Whitney makes an admission.

7. Stuart starts working for Kathy and as he arrives at the restaurant, Ian takes the first opportunity he can get to humiliate him.

Coronation Street

8. As a prison riot gets underway, Abe encourages David to carry out his revenge against Josh. Amid the violence, David insists that he will deal out justice in his own way. Things take a dark turn when Josh is then stabbed and left for dead.

9. Sinead’s loved ones put on an early Christmas for her to enjoy but tensions mount between her and Daniel. Later, Daniel finds himself overcome with emotion and as Bethany comforts him, things get out of hand, leaving him filled with regret.

10. Max returns home, much to the reluctance of Marion, but Shona soon hears bad news about David.

11. Gail returns from Thailand and wants to pull her family together with yoga – but it looks like it’s going to take a lot more than that.

12. As Sinead deteroriates, she stirs in her bed to see her loved ones gathered around her and Dr Gaddas confirms that it’s too late to move her now – the end is nigh. Daniel siezes the opportunity to spend some emotional final moments with his beloved wife.

13. CCTV footage of the riot comes to light and David looks pretty guilty as he is seen close to Josh around the time of the stabbing. David insists that he is innocent but when Shona hears about this, even she is left doubting him.

14. After Sinead passes away, Daniel steels himself to deliver the devastating news to everyone. Life will never be the same for them again.

Emmerdale

15. After Faith gets the wrong idea about who Moira is cheating with, Cain is on the warpath and takes a violent Pete hostage. Pete is torn over whether to protect Moira’s secret but as Cain turns violent, he reveals she has been sleeping with Nate.

16. On the day of the Woolpack re-opening, Chas and Marlon get stuck in the loos when the lock breaks. Chas’ waters break and she is left in a panic that she only has Marlon’s help as she goes into labour.

17. Cain lures Nate and Moira onto a boat trip but before long, he is confronting Nate over his affair with Moira. As Nate gets confrontational, Cain attacks him and they end up in a fight of life or death.

18. Mandy and Vinny are delighted when their scam to get their hands on Lydia’s inheritance comes together but they are thrown when someone comes round to discuss the money – can they get Lydia out of the way?

19. Marlon and Chas’ shouts can’t be heard over the music so Marlon makes her a makeshift bed and helps her through the process. As she wills Paddy to arrive, she gives birth to their baby.

20. In the melee, Moira falls from the boat and finds herself trapped among the weeds. Meanwhile, an explosion rips through the boat, leaving everyone fighting for their lives.

Hollyoaks

21. With Tony missing, his dad Edward turns up and wants to be there for Diane as she tries to get her head around everything. He is soon charming the locals and proving supportive – but Finn is instantly suspicious of his true motives.

Advertisement

22. As Goldie fears that her mum is out of control following discovered evidence, she forces Breda to attend therapy appointments and Breda fears that she will give away too much. Later, Tony is hopeful when Goldie arrives at the pig farm…

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

23. Cindy hires Woody to get to work on her new building project and she ignores warnings about the unstable underground passage. Tom is frustrated that she seems to have just hired Woody for his looks and sets out to intervene.

24. Darren is put out by everyone fawning over Edward and so he plans a surprise for a delighted Mandy to prove that he can be impulsive and romantic. As he sweeps her off her feet, will he prove the point he is trying to make?

25. Luke advises Ollie against giving up the baby for adoption and Ollie is torn between what he wants and what Brooke is decided. Later, Luke determines to prove himself to Ollie and makes a business proposition.

description: A major week of soap dramas revealed with death and destruction aplenty.
